content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, and it's close to all important facilities. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for a price that truly reflects the value of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's great. I'm a student and I'm looking for a place with the lowest price possible. By the way, I heard from a friend that there is a similar apartment in the same area for a lower price. That's why I'm trying to negotiate the best price. How much are you offering for the apartment?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your effort, but let me assure you, this apartment is of superior quality. I understand your friend might have mentioned another apartment, but the condition and location of my apartment are far superior. Now, I'm willing to consider a reasonable price, but let's start with 1500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the apartment is of high quality. However, I'm still a student and I'm looking for a place with the lowest possible price. That's why I'm trying to negotiate the best price. Would you consider a lower price of 1300 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, but let's not forget the quality of this apartment. It's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, and it's close to all important facilities. I'm willing to be reasonable, but I can't go as low as 1300 euros. How about 1450 euros? It's a fair price for the quality of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation. I appreciate it. I agree to the price of 1350 euros per month. This price is acceptable to me.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1350] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I look forward to signing the lease agreement soon. By the way, do you have any recommendations for furniture rental services in the city? I'm a student, so I'm looking for a cost-effective option.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your need for cost-effectiveness. I don't have any specific recommendations for furniture rental services, but I suggest you do some research online. There are many options available, and I'm sure you can find one that fits your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your suggestion. I'll look into it. Is there anything else I need to know about the apartment before we proceed with the lease agreement?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for asking. I believe I've covered all the important aspects of the apartment. It's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, and it's close to all important facilities. I'm sure you'll find it comfortable and convenient to live in. If there's anything else you need to know, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your time and consideration. I look forward to signing the lease agreement soon.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Mr. Abbasi. I'm glad we were able to reach an agreement. I look forward to having you as my tenant. If there's anything else I can help you with, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. Is there a specific date you would like to schedule for signing the lease agreement?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm available almost every day of the week, so we can schedule the lease signing at your earliest convenience. Let me know a date and time that works best for you, and I'll make sure to be there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. How about we schedule the lease signing for next Monday at 10 am?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That sounds perfect, Mr. Abbasi. We'll meet next Monday at 10 am to sign the lease agreement. I'll see you then.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I look forward to meeting you then. Is there anything else I need to bring or prepare for the lease signing?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for asking, Mr. Abbasi. For the lease signing, please bring your identification document, preferably your passport. Also, please have your bank account information ready, as we'll need it to set up the automatic rent transfer. Other than that, we'll have everything else ready for the lease signing.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the reminder, Mr. Schmidt. I'll make sure to bring my passport and bank account information. Is there anything else I need to know before we sign the lease agreement?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for asking, Mr. Abbasi. Before we sign the lease agreement, please take some time to review the contract carefully. Make sure you understand all the terms and conditions. If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know, and I'll be more than happy to address them. After signing the lease, you'll be expected to pay the first month's rent and the security deposit. I look forward to a successful and long-term partnership with you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the information, Mr. Schmidt. I understand that I need to review the contract carefully and pay the first month's rent and security deposit after signing the lease. Is there anything else I need to know before we sign the lease agreement?

content: Thank you for asking, Mr. Abbasi. There is no other information at the moment. I'm glad we had this conversation, and I'm sure everything will go smoothly during the lease signing.
